list.title: The Meeting House Podcast
list.text: Join us each week for The Meeting House Podcast where we explore what it means to be a Christ-follower. Subscribe through iTunes or Spotify.
list.imageAlt: Team of pastors from The Meeting House sitting around a table and recording a podcast.

list.title: The After Party
list.text: Because the fun doesn't stop after Sunday morning. Join us as we dig deeper into various topics and ask the experts.
list.imageAlt: Young woman sitting at a table and looking at her notes from Sunday teaching at The Meeting House.

list.title: The Meeting House Roundtable
list.text: Join us as various leaders talk about a wide variety of topics related to culture and the Church.
list.imageAlt: Team of pastors from The Meeting House sitting around a table and recording a podcast.

list.title: The Meeting House Video Podcast
list.text: Subscribe to The Meeting House Video Podcast through iTunes or visit our Youtube channel for teaching videos and more.
list.imageAlt: Production volunteer recording a Meeting House video.
